infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your camera to take photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app saves photos to your camera roll.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your location to add GPS data to your photos.

plugins.cameraPermissionText: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your camera to take photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save photos to your camera roll.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save photos to your camera roll.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to add GPS data to photos.
